p: Total 50 albino male mice weighing (50 ± 2.0 g) were obtained from NIH (National institute for health) Islamabad. Experimental work followed all precautions and guidelines proposed by ethical committee of an Institute (National Veterinary Lab, Islamabad). Mice were kept in the animal house with following conditions: Standard animal house conditions were observed with special monitoring and maintenance. commercial chow (Feed Mills, Islamabad), water ad libitum and proper.
